channel.title: See through platebody, glitched shield, boots, and gloves.. HELP!
channel.description: Okay, so I'm not stupid, I'm just new to RSPS Development. I am using a PI source and client. And I just finished adding vesta's, statius, primal, and promethium.. Everything works great for the most part.. promethium and primal sheilds dont move when you run. the boots seem to just stretch instead of moving with your feet, and equipping gloves makes the characters arms disappear.. also the vesta's, statius, prom, and primal platebody's have graphics issues. they look decent if you're standing still but u can still see the characters sleeves.. and it gets way worse when you run.. it looks like the sleeves of the armor dont move but the arms of the character move? how would i go about fixing that? is it a source or client issue? is it animation issue? please help me! I have msn and teamviewer!

item.title: See through platebody, glitched shield, boots, and gloves.. HELP!
item.dc:creator: @whitefox125 whitefox125
item.description:
@whitefox125 wrote:

i hope this helps, its the closest i could get to a screenshot cuz it wouldnt let me copy and paste the screenshot from paint… this is the primal body, but the same problem with all the bodies… and here are the ints for it

    if(i == 13993)
{
	itemDef.actions = new String[5];
	itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield";
	itemDef.modelRotation1 = 485;
	itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0;
	itemDef.modelZoom = 1447;
	itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
	itemDef.maleEquip1 = 54119;
	itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 54119;
	itemDef.maleEquip2 = -1;
	itemDef.femaleEquip2 = -1;
	itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
	itemDef.modelID = 54121;
	itemDef.name = "Primal platebody";
	itemDef.description = "Primal platebody".getBytes();
}

Read full topic

item.title: See through platebody, glitched shield, boots, and gloves.. HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

whitefox125:

I added them correctly in item.Java, the body equips in the correct slot it just looks like really shitty models or incorrect ints, but I don’t know how to fix it… any suggestions? I have MSN and teamviewer.

hmmm. post a screen shot?

Read full topic

item.title: See through platebody, glitched shield, boots, and gloves.. HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

whitefox125:

Okay, so I’m not stupid, I’m just new to RSPS Development. I am using a PI source and client. And I just finished adding vesta’s, statius, primal, and promethium… Everything works great for the most part… promethium and primal sheilds dont move when you run. the boots seem to just stretch instead of moving with your feet, and equipping gloves makes the characters arms disappear… also the vesta’s, statius, prom, and primal platebody’s have graphics issues. they look decent if you’re standing still but u can still see the characters sleeves… and it gets way worse when you run… it looks like the sleeves of the armor dont move but the arms of the character move? how would i go about fixing that? is it a source or client issue? is it animation issue? please help me! I have msn and teamviewer!

you didnt add it to the right spot in the items file. you gotta add plate bodys in the plate body section, gloves in the glove section…ect. if nothing is defined for that item, the spot is the right hand wep.

Read full topic
